title: Two Tower Hybrid Search Engine
description: A hybrid search engine combining keyword (TF-IDF) and semantic search using a Two-Tower neural network. Users can tune the balance between keyword and semantic relevance.

title: Live Vision Encoder - Transformers (ViT)
description: Buiot the encoder part of the Vision Transformer (ViT) from scratch in PyTorch for handwritten digit classification. The project features a real-time webcam demo that recognizes digits as you show them. This experiment highlights the classic machine learning challenge of adapting a model trained on clean data (like MNIST) to unprocessed, real-world images. The next logical step is to build a pre-processing pipeline that can automatically format the live camera feed to match the training data, dramatically improving real-world accuracy. A new project will come with the full transformers with multiple digits inference

title: HackerNews Score Predictor with Word Embeddings Implementation
description: A machine learning project that predicts HackerNews post scores using title embeddings and feature engineering with custom Word2Vec implementation.

title: DeepNavierStokes: Solving the RANS equations for 1D channel flow using neural networks
description: This project is a Master's thesis at Harvard University, focusing on solving the Reynolds-Averaged Navier-Stokes (RANS) equations using neural networks. It integrates deep learning techniques with traditional fluid dynamics to achieve ultra fast simulations with similar accuracy to traditional methods.
